txt.en: The Huorn wants nothing more than to crush the strong packs of Orcs at their encampment in Fangorn.\n\nWith your efforts combined, the Orcs will stand no chance against you.
You have defeated many Orcs in a tough little encampment at the edge of Fangorn's eaves.
The Orcs have gathered in great numbers at the White Hand encampment in Fangorn, but with the assistance of a vengeful Huorn, they stand no chance.
Defeated Orcs at the White Hand encampment with the Huorn's help ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Orcs at the White Hand encampment with the Huorn's help ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orcs are at the White Hand Encampment at the north-east edge of Fangorn's eaves.\n\nYou should crush the Orcs with the help of the vengeful Huorn who has begun to follow your lead.
You have defeated many Orcs in a tough little encampment at the edge of Fangorn's eaves.
